creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: accordion pleated wrap skirt with 3 1/4" wide blue waistband and long ties; blue on white; tie-dyed; center horizontal 3" band in geometric batik pattern; some appliqued embroidery in red and brown
title: Skirt
